backend/main.mo: Motoko actor managing user profiles with access control checks for viewing and saving profiles.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence record describing a UI update to two logo images in the BrandsBanner component.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: List of concise summaries for all frontend source files.
frontend/docs/FILE_TREE.md: Documentation stub outlining the project’s file structure.
frontend/docs/screenshot-assets-audit.md: Documentation explaining the screenshot asset audit tool and its detection rules.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS layer defining theme variables and base styles.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry file setting metadata, favicons, and loading the React app.
frontend/public/_redirects: Netlify-style redirects enabling .well-known access and SPA fallback.
frontend/public/.well-known/ic-domains: Domain verification file listing allowed IC domains.
frontend/public/ic-assets.json: IC asset config enabling .well-known directory matching.
frontend/scripts/audit-screenshot-assets: Node script that scans for screenshot-like images and checks if they are referenced.
frontend/scripts/verify-well-known.mjs: Node script verifying domain files, redirect rules, and ic-assets.json validity.
frontend/src/.well-known/ic-domains: Source copy of IC domain verification entries.
frontend/src/App.tsx: App entry configuring TanStack Router with routes wrapped in a site layout.
frontend/src/components/contact/ContactF: React form component using react-hook-form to collect contact details, validate inputs, and simulate submission.
frontend/src/components/home/BrandsBanne: Displays a banner section with a list of brand logos in a responsive grid.
frontend/src/components/home/HeroCarouse: Implements an autoplaying, draggable image carousel with reduced-motion support.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Renders the site footer with branding, navigation links, contact info, and copyright.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Responsive site header with branding, navigation links, and a mobile drawer menu.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Defines the main page layout including header, footer, and routed content outlet.
frontend/src/components/motion/RevealOnS: Wrapper component that reveals its children with a scroll-triggered animation.
frontend/src/components/services/Service: Card component displaying a service’s icon, title, description, and CTA.
Dialog panel showing detailed service info, features, applications, and a contact link.
Provides search and category filter controls for the services list.
frontend/src/config/branding.ts: Centralized branding configuration containing logo paths and company metadata.
frontend/src/content/services.ts: Defines a Service interface and a list of detailed service configurations including descriptions, features, applications, and icons.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, recreating it on identity changes and invalidating related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, managing login, logout, stored identities, and AuthClient configuration.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty compatibility file indicating all backend query hooks were removed for static builds.
frontend/src/hooks/useReducedMotion.ts: Hook that tracks the user's reduced‑motion preference via matchMedia.
frontend/src/hooks/useSeo.ts: Hook that updates document title and meta tags for SEO and social previews.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining design tokens, themes, utilities, and component styles including slideshow and accent colors.
frontend/src/main.static.tsx: Entry point for static builds rendering App with a configured React Query client.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Main application entry that wraps App with InternetIdentityProvider and React Query client.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: React page displaying company information, expertise, and SEO metadata with animated reveal components.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Renders the contact page with SEO settings, company contact details, a map embed, and a contact form with scroll animations.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Implements the home page with SEO, a typing‑effect hero section, a carousel, brand banner, and service overview sections.
frontend/src/pages/SolutionsPage.tsx: Displays filterable automation solutions with search, category filtering, and a detail panel using scroll animations and SEO setup.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading URL parameters, syncing them with sessionStorage, and managing hash‑based query values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS theme, colors, typography, container settings, animations, and plugin integrations.
frontend/tsconfig.node.json: TypeScript config for Node‑side tooling using ESNext modules and bundler resolution.
frontend/vite.config.ts: Vite config enabling React, path aliasing, a build‑time verification plugin, chunk splitting, and dev server settings.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, feature requests, known issues, and the current state related to replacing banner logo images.
